Articles.Content:
Good Morning,

The u-tube video of the tour of the ISS was passed on to me. It might inspire others in there building of space stations and space crafts.

http://www.youtube.com/embed/doN4t5NKW-k

BJQ

I've seen videos touring the ISS before and you said it inspired you to build a station. I love building stations, ISS replicas are great, I only have two limiting factors. 1 I have a crappy eye for pretty designs. 2 my pc isn't capable of loading a 250+ part station very well. But cool video.
I tried doing a single lauch ISS replica.... not going to work.
I don't know why someone would want to go into space with such an inefficient hair style...

I don't know why someone would want to go into space with such an inefficient hair style...

It's interesting that they let long hair float like that. Usually on the ground, labs don't allow people to leave loose long hair as it could be hazardous (catch on fire, get caught in machinery, etc.). I guess they made the ISS extra safe to allow that.
